20300.name: {^H{6arper {^S{6anctuary
description: {7You have arrived in the {^H{6arper {^S{6sanctuary{7, this is a safe haven for
all {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r {7members and offers accsess to the remainder of the clan
hall.  {7This is a {&Bright {7room and is adorned with many {^B{6e{8u{7a{&t{7i{*f{6u{^l
T{6apestries {7and various artworks.  {7A large {#G{3l{7o{&w{7i{3n{#g {7archway is east
through which lays the rest of the {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r {^H{6all{7.  {7In the corner is a
fountain, flowing with a sweet smelling liquid.  {7There is also a small
plaque on the wall along with a {3[{%S{5ign{3] {7and a {3[{%M{5ap{3]
{&Directions and facilities of the {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r {^C{6lan {^H{6all{&:
{^C{6lan {^H{6ealer {^= {@3E {&(heals and also curses and repents alignment)
{^P{6ortal {^R{6oom {^= {@E {&(Portals goto Museum, ZoZo, MS, Torregiano)
{^C{6lan {^S{6hops {^= {@3E,N {&(Mount, Pet and Equip shops all branch from this room)
{^P{6ractice {^R{6oom {^= {@3E,D,N {&(Clan Training/Practice dummies)
{^G{6uild{^H{6all {^= {@3E,D,2N {&(Clan trainer of skills and does restrings)
{^S{6uicide {^M{6ob {^= {@3E,D,2W {&(Just say 'kill me' and BAM your dead hehe)
{^B{6attle {^A{6rena {^= {@3E,S,E {&(a free pk arena for clannies)
{&There have been some small changes within the clan hall, if you have any queires as to regulations feel free to ask or note me, or speak with jovik.
{&These new rules are to get us ready for clan raiding. There is also a map added with directions to all the room locations, i have tried to keep it as close as possible to the initial setup.
Yep, The Tapestries sure are beautiful.
{CHarper Clan Rules{x
1.  No Harper shall be wanted at any time on purpose.
2.  All Harpers shall be citizens of the Tripower government OR no government at all.
3.  Harpers shall not attack members of CoC, Allin, Seph, and CoM.
4.  Harpers are neutral and NON-aggresive against Deil, Zhents, Legion, and X-Cops.
5.  Harpers are at war with and aggresive against CoD, CoS, CoN, and to a lesser degree DHPK.
6.  A Harper will help out a fellow Harper against Any Enemy any time that they need help, we are a family, and we protect our brothers and sisters.
{CAll For Now, Thanks For Your Time{x

20314.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {WCandidate {CL{co{Cu{cn{Cg{ce{x
description: You find yourself in a room unlike the rest of the Holy Grove when
you just came from.  The whole room is as {WWhite{x as snow, and is
completely clean.  There is a small amount of furniture in the room
for applicants to the {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{Cs{x to sit on while talking to their
interviewers.  Looking the way you came you can see the rope ladder
hidden well in the leaves of the forest, and to the north you see
another room much like this one with a large table.

20307.name: Temple Of Milil
description: Unused

20332.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {WSanctuary{x
description: {wThe room you are now in is a very basic looking room with places to
kneel to worship your favorite diety all along the walls.  In the
center of the room you notice a small pulpit with the {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{C's
{WSpiritual Leader{w standing behind it.
{&Heading back East is the main room of the {^T{6hirsty {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r {^T{6avern{&.{x

20327.name: {CA{cr{Cm{ca{Cn{c's {wSanctuary{x
description: {wYou open a the door and enter a small chapel, dedicated to the God of
{8W{Wa{8r and {CJ{cu{Cs{ct{Ci{cc{Ce.  {w You can see s simple table and a simple chair
nearby.  On the table is a lit candle swimmiwng in a pool of melted
{ywax.  {w There is also another source of light in the room,a lit
candelabra positioned by the eastern wall.  On the western wall you
can see a small library.  You pick a book randomly and skip through
its pages to see what it is about.  Inside you find prayers meant to
be sung in the name of {BT{by{Br,{was well as a silver Ankh used to mark an
important page.  You read through that page and realize that it is a
Paladin's death song.  The door open behind you and you feel the
presence of a good being.  Arman smiles at you and inquires: "How may
I help you my child?"

20310.name: {^T{6hirsty {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r {^T{6avern
description: You have entered the Tavern of the {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r{^s{x.  Your nostrils are assailed
with the odor of freshly roasted peanuts, and your ears are delighted with
the best music in the realms.  It is here where the harpers come to relax
and enjoy a nice beverage, and some of Jerval's world famous roasted
peanuts.  The atmosphere of this tavern makes you feel relaxed, and your
worries drift away as your thoughts drift twords recreation.
{&Just off to the south is the {^H{6arper {^H{6ealer {&and resting area.
{&Off to the West is a spiritual man, selling mounts to the {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r{^s{&.
{&In a little room to the East is a man selling '{^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r {&Doves' {&They
seem to make an excellent choice for 'Pets'.
{&Down below is a man who sells equipment and potions, he has a vast selection for sale.

20325.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {CC{cl{Ca{cn {RBattle {wArena{x
description: You are in the southeastern corner of the clan arena, and can see
on the walls all around you makings from battles of old from the great
{CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {CW{ca{Cr{cr{Ci{co{Cr{cs{x.

20311.name: {^G{6uild{^H{6all {7of The {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r{^s
description: This small square building has one room, and you are in it.  Covering
every wall and a couple tables, is just about everything one would need to
learn just about any new skill, or hone their current ones.  Standing in the
middle of the room is the {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r{^s{x Guildmaster with his arms
crossed in front of his chest.
This door leads back to the {@P{2ractice {@Y{2ard{x

20315.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {CL{co{Cu{cn{Cg{ce{x
description: This room is a bit more average looking than the rooms on either
side of it, but it is still decorated quite fancily.  There are small
objects laying around the room that were acquired by {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{Cs{x on
various adventures throughout the realms.  In the center of the room
there is a large table made completely out of {YGold{x for the active
{CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{Cs{x to discuss the admission of applicants around.

20326.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {CC{cl{Ca{cn {RBattle {wArena{x
description: You are now in the northeastern corner of the {RBattle {wArena{x, and all
around you there are hills where fellow harpers have run to trying to
get some protection as their clan members came after them.  While the
fighting is all in good fun you can see blood from where these harpers
have failed to get the protection they needed in time.  The arena
continues to the west and south.

20316.name: {CJ{co{wv{ci{Ck'{Ws {wLaboratory{x
description: {wYou have etered a very well kept room with vials of strange colored
{8Ethers{w all over the counters.  Around the edges of the room there is
not a single space to sit as most people stand in the owner's
presence.

20318.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {CC{cl{Ca{cn {RBattle {WArena{x
description: You are in the {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{C's{x arena.  This large room extends as far as
the eye can see to the north, east, and south.

20324.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {CC{cl{Ca{cn {RBattle {wArena{x
description: You are now along the eastern wall of the battle arena, and can see
all around you places where heros have fought their clan members to
better both of their skills.  You can see to the north, south, and
west as far as the eye can see.

20323.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {CC{cl{Ca{cn {RBattle {wArena{x
description: You are walking along the south wall of the clan arena, and can see
clearly in any direction.  As far as you can see to the north, west,
and east there are open fields for the {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{C's{x to practice their
skills with one another.

20308.name: {@P{2ractice {@Y{2ard{x
description: You exit the interior of the hall and enter a decent sized court yard,
there are several practice dummies strewn around the yard, and one large
dummy stands in the center of the room, you notice the face of the dummy
resembles that of Malik, Cyric's Seraph of Lies.  The {#Sun{x and the breeze
here make you feel ready for a good fight.  To the north you see a small
building, with the moon and harp symbol on its door.
This way leads to a small Guildhall
Don't Look At It!!!
Didn't your mother teach you anything? :P

20334.name: {CF{clag {WR{woom{x
description: {x

20305.name: {^R{6oom {^o{6f {^P{6ortals
description: {wYou have entered the great portal of the {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{Cs{w.  Magical portals lead to  -
{: {^W{6estbridge{x
{: {^Z{6ozo{x
{: {^M{6useum{x
{: {^T{6orregiano{x
{&This portal heads to the Brewery area of torregianio...
{&A corridor heads east, opening up other areas of the {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r {^C{6lan {^H{6all{&.
{&Looking up is Westbridges, Market Square...
{&ZoZo is below us, just need to take a step down...

20329.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {WA{wv{Wi{wa{Wr{wy{x
description: The room you have entered is a fairly large room with {GTall Trees{x in
the corners and {8Iron Cages{x holding {WPure White Doves{x.  In the center of
the room stands a small {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{x shopkeeper trying to set you up with
the pet or mount of your dreams.
{&To the west is the main room in the {^T{6hirsty {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r {^T{6avern.

20304.name: {^G{6reat {^H{6all{x
description: {wYou have entered the great clan hall of the {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{C's{w.  The room has
a healing pool in the center and a priest standing over it watching
for hurt harpers.
{&North is the entrance to the {^T{6hirsty {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r {^T{6avern{&. Many items can be found for sale in there.
{&To the West is a hallway that leads to the portals and clan recall point.
{&The Southern hallway leads to the clan {^B{6attle {^A{6rena{&.

20321.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {CC{cl{Ca{cn {RBattle {WArena
description: You are along the southern wall of the arena.  To the north and
east as far as you can see there are rooms for the clan members to
work on their skills with one another.

20319.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {CC{cl{Ca{cn {RBattle {WArena
description: You are in the very center of the {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{x arena, and as far as you
can see in any direction there is open room for you to test your
skills with those of other harpers.

20328.name: {WThe Study of {CV{ce{Cl{ck{Ci{ce{Cn{x
description: {WYou have entered a large gloomy room and as you look around, you
are met by the gaze of two female statues one portraying Mystra, the
Goddess of Magic the other Selena, wife of the Wizard who this study
belongs to.  The only light in the room is the {Mp{murple{W flames that
surround each of the four statues in the room.  Two at the door
(Mystra and Selena) and one in each of the far corners of the room,
each showing a Drow Warrior.  The only window in the room is located
in the far wall but heavy curtains prevent any light from entering the
room.  In the middle is a large desk littered with books and dusty
tomes though a small area is cleared as a work area.  The only other
objects in the room are huge book shelves filled with tomes and
parchments hiding{BA{brcane{W knowledge and a spiral staircase in the corner
closest to you from which you came.

20301.name: {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r {^H{6all{x
description: {wYou are in a long plain hallway with very few decorations on any
wall.  The healing chamber is to the east and the portals are to your
west.  {x
{&To the West is the clan {^P{6ortal {^R{6oom{&.{x
{&Another step east will take you to the {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r {^H{6ealer{&.{x

20331.name: {8H{wo{8m{we {8O{wf {8Th{we {8D{wi{8s{wg{8r{wu{8n{wt{8l{we{8d {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{x
description: {wAfter many years of fighting off the evils of the world the stress
got to this old harper and he had to be separated from the rest of the
clan.  The only reason that he gets visitors at all is that he is
quite proficient in killing and can put members of the clan out of
their misery quickly and painlessly.

20322.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {CC{cl{Ca{cn {RBattle {wArena{x
description: You are along the northern wall of the {RBattle {WArena{x, and all around
you there are signs of past matches that have occured here.  The arena
continues as far as the eye can see to the east, west, and south.

20306.name: {!C{1asting {!R{1oom{x
description: This square grey room is empty, yet you can feel the magical energies
this room had been endowed with. This looks like it would make a perfect place to summon monsters for research.
a large SIGN hangs on the north wall
{!NO SUMMONING NON-HARPERS
{0monsters do not apply
{!DO NOT LEAVE MONSTERS UNATTENDED
{x

20313.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {WCeremony {CHall
description: As you enter this room you are amazed at the wealth that the
{CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{Cs{x have put into it.  The floor is made from tiles that seem to
be made of {wIvory{x they are so white and smooth.  The walls all around
you have {GB{ge{ma{cu{Ct{Gi{gf{mu{cl {CP{ca{Ci{cn{Ct{ci{Cn{cg{Cs{x of all of the finest {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{x leaders.  The
last thing that you notice about this room is the high vaulted
ceilings made out of the scales of the {rC{Br{go{8m{Wa{rt{Bi{gc {8D{Wr{ra{Bg{go{8n{Ws{x.

20312.name: {cMrs. Ruskettle's Room{x
description: You are in the room of the only Halfling bard to ever exist.
{&The {@P{2ractice {@Y{2ard {&is off to the North.
{&Off to the West is the harper meeting room.
{&Back Up lies the {^H{6arper {^H{6ealing {&Room.

20330.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{x {WSanctuary{x
description: {wThe room you are now in is a very basic looking room with places to
kneel to worship your favorite diety all along the walls.  In the
center of the room you notice a small pulpit with the {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{C's
{WSpiritual Leader{w standing behind it.

20302.name: in the air, north of the tower

20320.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {CC{cl{Ca{cn {RBattle {WArena
description: You are along the northern most wall of the arena, and to the south
and east you can see large open spaces for all of your bretheren to
help each other improve.

20303.name: {6Gnairea{^'{6s {^S{6h{^o{6p{^e{x
description: This room is full of wonderous items that tickle your fancy and pique
your curiousity.  A desk lies near the north wall.  Standing behind the desk
of his shop, a short man is showing off his rare and delicate items.
Looking more closely, the little man seems to be a halfling.  The merchant
smiles warmly and welcomes you to his shop.  There is a soft melody playing
in the back of your mind, purifying it from dark and evil thoughts.
{&Upwards is {^J{6erval {&in the {^T{6hirsty {^H{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r {^T{6avern{&.

20317.name: {8Back Hallway{x
description: {wYou are in a hallway leading to the harpers clan arena.  {x
{&The {^H{6arper {^H{6ealer {&is off to the North.
{&to the East is the {^C{6lan {!Battle {&Arena.

20309.name: {^M{6e{^e{6t{^i{6n{^g {6Hall{x
description: This is a medium-sized circular room.  The walls are covered with
tapestries depicting scenes from long forgotten battles fought well before
your time.  The light in this room comes from a large chandelier in the
center of the room In the middle of the room is a round table, with a
{Bcrescent moon{x and a {&s{0i{&l{0v{&e{0r {&h{0a{&r{0p{x engraved into it,
the edges of the table are inlaid with gold.  A small fireplace is set into
the wall here giving off warmth.
{&To the West is the {*D{7isgruntle{*d {^H{6arper{&.

20302.name: {^P{6riest{x of {^M{6ilil{x~
description:
One of the wandering minstrels of Milil sits upon
a chair here singing the "Tears of Selune" His beautiful
music begins to form into healing light...
20302.room_name: The {^P{6riest{x of {^M{6ilil{x stands here, healing the {^h{6a{^r{6p{^e{6r{^s{x

20303.name: a Standard Issue Strifer~
description:
This simple dummy reminds you of someone who has a mental disability, It
must be a Strifer.
subroutines:
F act U
F vul C
20303.room_name: A Generic Strifer stands here, picking his nose.

20304.name: a replica of Malik~
description:
This ugly dummy looks to be constructed to resemble Cyric's very own
Seraph of Lies.  In its hand is a fake Cyrinishad.  It's mouth is open, and
its hand is raised, as if it is preaching to all the slow-minded suckers.
subroutines:
F act U
F vul C
20304.room_name: Malik el Sami yn Nasser stands here holding the Cyrinishad.

20305.name: Tavernkeeper Jerval~
description:
{7After many years of roasting peanuts, Jerval has traded them in for
a chefs knife and apron and has started going gourmet.  {7The little
Gnome still looks funny jn a floppy chefs hat and uniform but his food
is reputed to be some of the best around.

20306.name: The Ancient Mentor~
description:
This old man looks very wise, and he has a very long beard that looks to
have been growing for centuries.  He smiles upon you and looks ready to
teach you anything you wish to learn.
20306.room_name: A man with his arms crossed in front of his chest smiles at you.

20307.name: (no short description)~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

20309.name: Mrs. Ruskettle~
description:
An extremely small halfling is here, who strikes you as short even for the race that she is.
You notice instantly that her hair is a brilliant {rRed{x, and it contrasts very well with her {yHazel{x eyes.

20310.name: {wStatue of the Goddess of Magic{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 20311 100~

20312.name: {CJ{co{wv{ci{Ck{W's {wAssistant{x~
description:
A tall man stands here mixing all of the potions that his friend Jovik uses in battles.
He is a tall titan magician, and all over you can see scars from his days out on the Harper's front lines.

20313.name: {CS{cp{Ce{cc{Ct{cr{Ca{cl {WH{wa{Wr{wp{We{wr{x~
description: Before you see what looks like the {Wholy {CS{cp{Ci{cr{Ci{ct{x of a long dead {WH{wa{Wr{wp{We{wr{x warrior.

20314.name: {WPure White {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {WDove{x~
description: Before you is the {WWhitest{x bird that you have ever seen, and the goodness that it represents overwhelms everyone who looks at it.
20314.room_name: {wA {WWhite Dove{w flying over it's master's head.{x

20315.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {WBird {wKeeper{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par GHIJK
20315.room_name: A tall man stands here taking care of the birds.

20316.name: {wThe {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr{C's {WSpiritual leader{x~
description:
{wAn elderly man stands here trying to sell you a companion for life to carry you through the hard times.
{x

20318.name: {CH{ca{Cr{cp{Ce{cr {wElder{x~
subroutines:
M speech 20318 yes~
M act 20312 bows~

20319.name: bob~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

20320.name: {CJ{Wovie {cS{wtands {cH{were {cF{wighting {cF{wor {cH{wis {cM{waster{x~
20320.room_name: {WThe spiritual guardian of jovik stands here with {RFire{W in his eyes.{x

20323.name: An invisable specter~
20323.room_name: An invisable specter floats above all here.
